attributes.action: MPs to declare all investments, directorships and family conflicts of interest.
attributes.additional_details: Legislate to ensure MPs have FULL constituency resources and time, less distractions from elected role, to ensure value for money to tax payer and representation to constituency.
attributes.background: The register of interests is proven unsuitable for Mps with extra discoveries having been hi-lighted. Needs more direction and less ambiquity. And stated actions for breaches to compensate, and not just say SORRY.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about existing arrangements for MPs to declare interests, but we're not sure exactly how you would like these to be changed.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ban MPs from having paid second jobs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555896

Ban MPs from having shares or positions in any businesses: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562361
